sources.title: 1941 Der Fuchs Von Glenarvon
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1941.. Karl Ludwig Diehl,Olga Tschechowa  und dem Kinderstar Traudl Starke in ihrer letzten Rolle.. Der Fuchs von Glenarvon

metadata.Plot: An English peace judge in an Irish district is married to an Irishwoman. She is a caring patriot. He is heavily indebted by a life of luxury, and doesn't shy away from dark deeds to maintain his lifestyle.
metadata.Writer: Hans Bertram, Wolf Neumeister, Nicola Rohn
metadata.Actors: Olga Tschechowa, Karl Ludwig Diehl, Ferdinand Marian
